title: Quinta das Freiras
body: A populated place in the parish of Santo Ant처nio do Funchal. The chapel of Nossa Senhora das Brotas was located in this place, founded in 1678 by Manuel Martins Brand찾o, of which there are still heaps of rubble. It houses the Parish Cemetery, built in 1839 and greatly expanded in 1903. This cemetery has a private chapel built in 1844 and consecrated to Nossa Senhora da Luz.

1678: Foundation of the chapel of Nossa Senhora das Brotas
